title: Can't find link to upgrade to New Client
body: I couldn't open the new client so I tried reinstalling it from the website. The download link given to me was of the legacy client and since legacy client is retired I can't launch into the game. And I can't find any link to upgrading to the new client or any link to downloading the new client anywhere on the website.

replies.body: Everyone is still transitioning to the updated client, so we haven't removed legacy files or installers just yet.  You should be able to update the legacy client through your patcher though (the screen with the Launch button).  If it's not showing up for you, toss over a screenshot so I can see what's going on.   Let me know!
